requests.name: Look Up a Refund
requests.description:
Get details on a refund transaction using a refund ID. Note that refund IDs aren't the same as payment or sale IDs.

Ref: https://developer.paypal.com/webapps/developer/docs/api/#look-up-a-refund
requests.headers:
Accept: application/json
Accept-Language: en_US
Content-Type: application/json
Authorization: Bearer <YOUR TOKEN HERE>
